title: Oce server issues
body: Anyone having issues on the oce server atm? i have a constant steady 300 ping on fibre and i have never had lag before in my life, also my friends cant connect to the server at all, just stuck on scanning files for 30 mins

replies.body: I have been having the same problems over the past couple of weeks, almost to the point it's becoming unplayable.  Thought it might have just been my internet (although haven't really had any issue in the past)

Hey skt 1 bisu,

I haven't seen any reports of server issues from other players. If you're still encountering connection issues, please let me know and we can work on troubleshooting those issues!
